snippet: The Native American Hopi tribe took a Parisian auction house to court Tuesday to try to block the sale of 32 sacred tribal masks.
abstract: Native American Hopi tribe takes Paris auction house Drouot to court to try to block the sale of 32 sacred tribal masks, arguing they are bitterly opposed to the use of sacred objects as merchandise.
lead_paragraph: The Native American Hopi tribe took a Parisian auction house to court Tuesday to try to block the sale of 32 sacred tribal masks.

headline.main: Hopi Tribe Sues Paris Auction House
headline.print_headline: France: Hopi Tribe Sues Auction House
